about_the_game:
In NOVA X9, become a fearless cyborg girl, and fight against hordes of enemies, snowballing your advantage as you smash through thousands of foes. Survive the relentless onslaught and unleash your skills in this roguelite survival game set in a dark and futuristic world.

Core Features:
Roguelike Combat with Permanent Death: Engage in challenging battles where every decision matters. Permanently lose your progress upon death, adding a thrilling element of risk and reward. Each run is a unique experience, testing your skills and strategic thinking.

Massive Unslaughtering: Engage in intense battles, annihilating hundreds of enemies on the screen simultaneously.

Snowballing Abilities: Level up your character and witness the exponential growth of your arsenal, acquiring random weapons and skills to unleash devastating attacks.

Cybernetic Implants: Enhance your cyborg heroine with permanent upgrades, augmenting her abilities and making her an unstoppable force in the futuristic world.

content_descriptors.notes: The player can unlock revealing outfits for the main character to wear.

name: NOVA Cyborg Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
